text: François-Xavier Ménage (born 27 June 1980) is a French journalist. ==Biography== Xavier was born on June 27, 1980 in Brittany. He created the television program, Capital, and currently is its host. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ploërmel Category:French television journalists Category:French male journalists
title: François-Xavier Ménage
